thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 18 of 218
thread.title: Beth Feind

author: Beth Feind
title: Beth Feind
text:
Good morning,
My Husband and I experienced a extremely courteous representative with your company. Cory helped my Husband get set up with an IID device and installation. Cory was personal and professional in his assistance to us. He was extremely timely in responses and call backs to our questions, even when our cell service was not working. He made the not so great situation into a pleasant experience and treated us both like real people and not just another transaction (he remembered our names every time we called)! My career is customer service based and would enjoy working with Cory any time. Our experience could not have been better, Thank you for this amazing service and your time.
Have a great day,
Jared & Beth Feind
